com.paymill.context
Class PaymillContext

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.context.PaymillContext

public final class PaymillContext
extends Object

PaymillContecxt loads the context of PAYMILL for a single account, by providing a merchants private key
It creates 8 services, which represents the PAYMILL API:

  • ClientService
  • OfferService
  • PaymentService
  • PreauthorizationService
  • RefundService
  • SubscriptionService
  • TransactionService
  • WebhookService
This services should not be created directly. They have to be obtained by the context's accessors.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov

Constructor Detail

PaymillContext

public PaymillContext(String apiKey)
Creates a PAYMILL context with the given apiKey. Connection timeout to PAYMILL by default is set to infinity.

Parameters:
apiKey - Private key from PAYMILL merchant center.

PaymillContext

public PaymillContext(String apiKey,
                      Integer timeout)
Creates a PAYMILL context with the given apiKey and timeout.

Parameters:
apiKey - Private key from PAYMILL merchant center.
timeout - Timeout in milliseconds for the HTTP connection to PAYMILL. If null or 0 then an interval of infinity is declared.
